name: Hornacle
description: The reborn Hornacle boasts two barnacle-encrusted legs, unlike its conspicuously peg-legged form of yore. Water Elementals revel in exchanging tales at sea of how the Celestial lost its leg. A tangle with an aquatic beast? An unbreakable curse? Only the deep-sea dweller itself knows the truth; not that it will ever share its story, of course. It's much too embarrassing.
